targets.query: SELECT sum("waiting_for_token") / (sum("waiting_for_token")+sum("processing_token")) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datafloworchestratorinfo.Info" WHERE "partition_id"= '$partition' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("processing_token") / (sum("waiting_for_token")+sum("processing_token")) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datafloworchestratorinfo.Info" WHERE "partition_id"= '$partition' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("forwarding_decision") / (sum("waiting_for_decision")+sum("deciding_destination") + sum("forwarding_decision"))FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datafloworchestratorinfo.Info" WHERE "partition_id"= '$partition' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("deciding_destination") / (sum("waiting_for_decision")+sum("deciding_destination") + sum("forwarding_decision")) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datafloworchestratorinfo.Info" WHERE "partition_id"= '$partition' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("waiting_for_decision") / (sum("waiting_for_decision")+sum("deciding_destination") + sum("forwarding_decision")) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datafloworchestratorinfo.Info" WHERE "partition_id"= '$partition' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("decisions_received")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datafloworchestratorinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("decisions_sent")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datafloworchestratorinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("generated_trigger_records"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("received_trigger_decisions"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("generated_data_requests")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.dataflow[^.]+\.[^.]+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("generated_trigger_records")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.dataflow[^.]+\.[^.]+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("data_request_width") / sum("generated_data_requests") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.dataflow[^.]+\.[^.]+/) AND $timeFilter AND "generated_data_requests" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("trigger_decision_width") / sum("received_trigger_decisions") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.dataflow[^.]+\.[^.]+/ ) AND $timeFilter AND "received_trigger_decisions" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("pending_trigger_decisions") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}.dataflow[^.]+\.[^.]+/ AND "partition_id"='${partition}') AND (time > now() - 1s)

SELECT sum("pending_fragments") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}.dataflow[^.]+\.[^.]+/ AND "partition_id"='${partition}') AND (time > now() - 1s)

SELECT sum("fragments_in_the_book") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}.dataflow[^.]+\.[^.]+/ AND "partition_id"='${partition}') AND (time > now() - 1s)

SELECT sum("waiting_time") / sum("completed_trigger_records") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.dfapplicationinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter AND "completed_trigger_records" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT sum("data_waiting_time") / sum("generated_trigger_records") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.dataflow[^.]+\.[^.]+/) AND $timeFilter AND "generated_trigger_records" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("waiting_time") / sum("completed_trigger_records") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.dfapplicationinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter AND "completed_trigger_records" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.description: Data will not be visualised if no TRs are in making at the time of querying. This is likely to happen in a condition of low trigger rate. So, no worries if it happens.

targets.query: SELECT min("min_time_since_assignment") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.dfapplicationinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter AND "outstanding_decisions" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT max("max_time_since_assignment") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.dfapplicationinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND  "outstanding_decisions" > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("total_time_since_assignment")/sum("outstanding_decisions") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.dfapplicationinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter AND "outstanding_decisions" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT sum("total_time_since_assignment")/sum("outstanding_decisions") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.dfapplicationinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter AND "outstanding_decisions" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Pending TD waiting time

targets.query: SELECT sum("writing_time") / sum("new_records_written") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datawriterinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter AND "new_records_written" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT sum("writing_time") / sum("new_records_written") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datawriterinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' ) AND $timeFilter AND "new_records_written" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("loop_counter")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("sleep_counter")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("pending_fragments") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("fragments_in_the_book") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("pending_trigger_decisions") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("lost_fragments") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("unexpected_fragments") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("invalid_requests") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("duplicated_trigger_ids") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("timed_out_trigger_records") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("unexpected_trigger_decisions") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("abandoned_trigger_records") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("data_waiting_time") / sum("generated_trigger_records") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter AND "generated_trigger_records" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" where $timeFilter
list.label: Partition name
list.name: partition
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" where $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WITH KEY="source_id" WHERE $timeFilter AND "partition_id"='${partition}'
list.label: Application name
list.name: application
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WITH KEY="source_id" WHERE $timeFilter AND "partition_id"='${partition}'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WITH KEY="source_id" WHERE $timeFilter AND "partition_id"='${partition}'
list.label: TRB name
list.name: TRBInstance
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WITH KEY="source_id" WHERE $timeFilter AND "partition_id"='${partition}'
